title: Decade after the World War II - context

content.question: The decade after the Second World War was characterized by all of the following EXCEPT

choices.label: a population explosion known as the “baby boom”
the growing strength of the movement for African American civil rights
widespread student opposition to the development of nuclear weaponry

content.answer: widespread student opposition to the development of nuclear weaponry

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
